snippet: If Albert Pujols brings a second championship to the Angels, a franchise now 51 years old, his contract will be worth it.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Los Angeles Angels first baseman Albert Pujols, slugger who signed an expensive 10-year deal with the Angels after winning a championship with the St Louis Cardinals; asserts that if Pujols brings a second championship to the Angels franchise, his contract will be worth it.
lead_paragraph: If Albert Pujols brings a second championship to the Angels, a franchise now 51 years old, his contract will be worth it.

headline.seo: In Market for Rings, Any Price Seems Worth Paying
headline.main: In Market for Rings, Any Price Seems Worth Paying
headline.print_headline: In Market for Rings, Any Price Seems Worth Paying
